well first of all, its not the companies vs each other, it such a case, MS wud hav surely won! its abt the Missions/Philosophies of both the Giants! first the links: Google - urlLink http://www.google.com/corporate/tenthings.html Microsoft - urlLink http://www.microsoft.com/mscorp/mission/ although both of them are quite same, they seem so different... google says that it makes users their primary focus... n they r quite good at it... MS on the other hand say this but as far as i think, are not delivering it! the most intrestin stuff was: (MS)Excellence - In everything we do do they do it? i sure think tht theres nothin equal to their Visual Studio for development! and Longhorn is looking far too good...
